name: ShackSwarm
description:
2 minute highscore stick shooter

wasd to move, mouse to shoot, or left analog to move, right analog to shoot on a xbox gamepad

laser and ship graphic from kenny's assets https://kenney.nl
Sand graphic made by hanan from flaticon.com
lime graphic from Smashicons from flaticon.com
lamp icon made by Creaticca Creative Agency from flaticon.com
musical note icon by Pixel Perfect from flaticon.com
snowboard icon by Freepik from flaticon.com
music from https://opengameart.org/content/through-space
